======
export
======

A Python package joke.

Installation
============

Just use pip::

    pip install export

Usage
=====

Start your interactive Python session and run::

    import export

Cool, eh?

FAQ
===

* Q: Does it run on Python 3?
  A: Sure, Python 2.6+ and 3.0+ are supported with a single codebase.

* Q: Is it webscale?
  A: You bet it is!
